ScaleGestureDetector - Class in it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures

UIRotateGestureRecognizer - Class in it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures
UIRotationGestureRecognizer is a subclass of UIGestureRecognizer that looks for rotation gestures involving two touches.
UIRotateGestureRecognizer(Context) - Constructor for class it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures.UIRotateGestureRecognizer
 
UISwipeGestureRecognizer - Class in it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures
UISwipeGestureRecognizer is a subclass of UIGestureRecognizer that looks for swiping gestures in one or more directions.
UISwipeGestureRecognizer(Context) - Constructor for class it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures.UISwipeGestureRecognizer
 
UITapGestureRecognizer - Class in it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures
UITapGestureRecognizer looks for single or multiple taps.
UITapGestureRecognizer(Context) - Constructor for class it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures.UITapGestureRecognizer
UITapGestureRecognizer looks for single or multiple taps.
